CHAT.comment: HALL STREET ASSOCIATES, L.L.C., Petitioner v. MATTEL, INC.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BETH S. BRINKMANN ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
